item.title: RDP/VNC (1)
item.description: I researched on the current tool choices for RDP/VNC. GUI remote access client Package name RDP VNC SSH SPICE command (menu) vinagre YES YES YES YES vinagre (remote desktop viewer) archived upstream remmina YES YES YES — remmina virt-viewer — YES — YES remote-viewer gnome-connections YES YES — — (connections) krdc YES YES — — BASICS: RDP (Remote Desktop Protocol): originally Windows focused VNC (Virtual Network Computing): originally Linux focused, uses RFB protocol SPICE (Simple Protocol for Independent Computing Environments): QEMU focused.
